description:
CBS is the latest network to unveil its fall premiere schedule, including dates for new series Kevin Can't Wait, Pure Genius and more.CBS是最先公布其秋季剧集回归时间表的网站，包括首播的新剧如《凯文不能等》（Kevin Can't Wait）、《绝对天才》（Pure Genius）等等。

The Big Bang Theory once again will begin the season on Monday nights thanks to CBS' Thursday night football deal. That's good news for Kevin James' Kevin Can Wait which premieres on Monday, Sept. 19 after Big Bang.多亏了CBS周四晚的足球赛事宜，《生活大爆炸》新一季将于周一晚回归。这对于凯文·詹姆斯的《凯文不能等》（Kevin Can Wait）来说是个好消息，该剧将在9月19日（周一）《生活大爆炸》结束后首播。

NCIS fans eager to get their Michael Weatherly fix don't have long to wait. Weatherly's new series Bull premieres Tuesday, Sept. 20 after the Season 14 premiere of NCIS.迫切希望看到迈克尔·卫斯理的《海军罪案调查处》的粉丝们将不会等太久了。卫斯理的最新剧集《专家证人》将在《海军罪案调查处》第14季播出后——即9月20日（周二）——首次播出。

Check out the full CBS premiere schedule below.快来看一看以下完整版的CBS美剧回归时间表吧！

 

Monday, Sept. 19

 8/7c: The Big Bang Theory《生活大爆炸》

8:30/7:30c: Kevin Can Wait《凯文不能等》（Kevin Can Wait）

 

Tuesday, Sept. 20

8/7c: NCIS《海军罪案调查处》

9/8c: Bull《专家证人》

10/9: NCIS: New Orleans《海军罪案调查处：新奥尔良篇》

 

Wednesday, Sept. 21

8/7c: Survivor《幸存者》

9:30/8:30c: Big Brother (finale)《老大哥》（最终季）

 

Friday, Sept. 23

8/7c: Macgyver《百战天龙》

9/8c: Hawaii Five-O《夏威夷特警》

10/9c: Blue Bloods《警察世家》

 

Saturday, Sept. 24

10/9c: 48 Hours《48小时》

 

Sunday, Sept. 25

7:30/6:30c: 60 Minutes《60分钟》

 

Wednesday, Sept. 28

9/8c: Criminal Minds《犯罪心理》

10/9c: Code Black《黑色代码》

 

Sunday, Oct. 2

8/9c: NCIS: Los Angeles《海军罪案调查处：洛杉矶篇》

9/10c: Madam Secretary《国务卿女士》

10/9c: Elementary《基本演绎法》

 

Monday, Oct. 3

9/8c: Scorpion《天蝎》

 

Monday, Oct. 10

9/c: 2 Broke Girls《破产姐妹》

 

Monday, Oct. 17

9:30/8:30c: The Odd Couple《天生冤家》

 

Monday, Oct. 24

8/7:c Kevin Can Wait (New Time Period)《凯文不能等》

8:30/7:30c: Man with a Plan《有计划的男子》

 

Thursday, Oct. 27

8:30/7:30c: The Great Indoors《室内奇兵》

9/8c: Mom《老妈》

9:30/8:30c: Life in Pieces《生活点滴》

10/9c: Pure Genius《绝对天才》

 

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: CBS秋季美剧回归时间表：破产姐妹、生活大爆炸来啦！

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

     麦可·布雷是演员 Crystal Bublé 的哥哥，他的姓氏 Bublé 可以发音为 "Boo-blay"。他的首张专辑《It's Time》神奇般的在72周内雄踞不仅加拿大，还包括日本、意大利等十多个国家内销量排名首位，专辑《It's Time》获得了2次格莱美提名。
     美国《时人杂志》称赞他“如丝绒般柔滑的男中音,独具品味地轻触你心”，《纽约邮报》称赞他 “这个令人注目、充满感情的低音歌手使人想起年轻的法兰克辛纳屈”，《洛杉矶时报》也称赞他“天生的中低音与动感的舞台表演,麦克布雷以轻松自在的自信, 与他的听众分享他活泼的诠释风味”。当你亲耳听到麦克布雷（Michael Buble）的倾情演唱时，你就会明白，以上这些溢美之词都不为过。不过，当你在报刊杂志上看到他的照片时，你还是会惊诧于眼前这位有着金棕色的卷发、超级会放电的大眼睛，笑容亲切又带点稚气的大男孩，竟有如此成熟迷人的中低嗓音，以及炉火纯青的精熟唱功。而今他将用他的温柔本色融化每颗冰封寒冷的心，带你回到上个世纪的浪漫年代。

模唱部分：

Another summer day
Has come and gone away
In Paris or Rome...
But I wanna go home

May be surrounded by
A million people I
Still feel all alone
Just wanna go home
Oh I miss you, you know

And I've been keeping all the letters
That I wrote to you
Each one a line or two
I'm fine baby, how are you
I would send them but I know that
It's just not enough
My words were cold and flat
And you deserve more than that

Another aeroplane
another sunny place
I'm lucky I know
But I wanna go home
I got to go home
Let me go home

I'm just too far from where you are
I wanna come home

And I feel just like I'm living
Someone else's life
It's like I just stepped outside
When everything was going right
And I know just why
You could not come along with me
This was not your dream
But you always believed in me...

Another winter day
Has come and gone away
In either Paris or Rome
And I wanna go home
Let me go home  

讲解：

模唱：

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Home

description:
It's certainly not a definitive solution to the problems that the banks have. I mean frankly, I think ultimately the definitive solution would be a resolution of this wider impasse. People are pulling money out because they are concerned about two possibilities. One is that there might be restrictions on the amount of money they can get out of cash machines or indeed take out of the country. The other is, I think the bigger fear ultimately is that their euro might be converted into a restored Greek national currency. And so no, it is not a definitive rescue by any stretch of the imagination.

Two quick "do we know" questions. Do we know how much the ECB is putting in on this occasion and how long that might last? And do we know how much has been pulled out to trigger this? I mean we heard in the news 4 billion.

Yeah, that's the figure that is coming from what news agencies describe as banking sources for the amount that's been pulled out over the course of the last working week. How much has the ECB authorised by way of additional emergency lending? We have not been told but reports coming from the eurozone banking world are that it's €2 or €3 billion. How long will it last? Well, again, there are suggestions around that it will keep the banks going until the end of Monday, in other words, until that summit, as you mentioned.

声明：音视频均来自互联网链接，仅供学习使用。本网站自身不存储、控制、修改被链接的内容。“沪江英语”高度重视知识产权保护。当如发现本网站发布的信息包含有侵犯其著作权的链接内容时，请联系我们，我们将依法采取措施移除相关内容或屏蔽相关链接。>>零基础直达流利生活口语班<<
